tutorialSidebar.label: Chapter 1: Getting Started with Spec-Driven Development
Chapter 2: Architecture Design for RAG Chatbots
Chapter 3: Frontend Development with Docusaurus and React

chapter-1-getting-started.title: Chapter 1: Getting Started with Spec-Driven Development
chapter-1-getting-started.description: This chapter will introduce you to the core concepts of Spec-Driven Development and how it applies to AI projects. We'll set up our development environment and explore the tools we'll be using.

chapter-2-architecture.title: Chapter 2: Architecture Design for RAG Chatbots
chapter-2-architecture.description: This chapter delves into the architectural considerations for building a Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) chatbot. We'll discuss the different components and how they interact.

chapter-3-frontend.title: Chapter 3: Frontend Development with Docusaurus and React
chapter-3-frontend.description: Learn how to build the user interface for our AI book using Docusaurus and React. This chapter covers the setup of the Docusaurus project and the creation of custom React components.

chapter-4-backend.title: Chapter 4: Backend Development with FastAPI
chapter-4-backend.description: This chapter focuses on building the backend API using FastAPI. We'll cover setting up endpoints for data ingestion and query processing.

chapter-5-rag-pipeline.title: Chapter 5: Building the RAG Pipeline
chapter-5-rag-pipeline.description: Dive deep into the core of the RAG chatbot: the pipeline. This chapter explains how to chunk documents, generate embeddings, and store them in a vector database like Qdrant.

chapter-6-deployment.title: Chapter 6: Deployment and CI/CD
chapter-6-deployment.description: The final chapter covers deploying our Docusaurus book and FastAPI backend. We'll set up CI/CD pipelines using GitHub Actions for automated deployment.

intro.title: Introduction to Spec-Driven AI
intro.description: Welcome to the Spec-Driven AI Book. This book will guide you through building an AI-powered application using a spec-driven development approach. You'll learn how to define your requirements clearly, design your architecture, and implement a robust solution.

rag-chatbot/index.title: RAG Chatbot Integration
rag-chatbot/index.description: This section details the integration of the RAG chatbot into the Docusaurus book. We'll cover the frontend components and how they communicate with the backend.
